title: Lima: Palomino Islands Excursion & Swimming with Sea Lions with Hotel Transfers
description: If you’re a lover of nature and wildlife then look no further than this immersive experience, which allows you to swim alongside wild sea lions in the waters surrounding the Palomino Islands. Perfect for families and travelers short on time, this half-day tour also includes a sightseeing cruise and round-trip transfers from your Lima hotel.
all_descriptions: If you’re a lover of nature and wildlife then look no further than this immersive experience, which allows you to swim alongside wild sea lions in the waters surrounding the Palomino Islands. Perfect for families and travelers short on time, this half-day tour also includes a sightseeing cruise and round-trip transfers from your Lima hotel.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Islas Palomino, lima, Callao PeruExperience an exclusive tour full of nature and wildlife on the Palomino Islands. The tour will start as soon as your driver and tour escort pick you up from your hotel onboard a safe minivan or SUV. You will be taken to Callao Harbor and board a speedboat equipped with life jackets, wetsuits and all the comfort and safety equipment necessary for you to swim with the sea lions in the Pacific Ocean.

The tour includes panoramic views of the San Lorenzo, El Camotal, Cabinzas and Palomino Islands from the speedboat. All of these islands belong to a natural and protected area by the state.

During the excursion, have the opportunity to see many sea birds such as red-legged cormorants, pelicans, Humboldt Penguins, the Inca Tern, the Peruvian booby, and the Guanay Cormorant. Enjoy this unique experience with the permanent assistance of a specialized tour guide and general emergency staff and equipment.

After the tour, our driver will take you back to your hotel or apartment.Duration: 3 hours

Daniel C
1 contribution

Disappointing and disorganized

Nov 2024 • Family
The tour company changed the departure time the morning of our excursion. The driver who picked us up from our accommodation was very polite and professional and on time. This tour had the potential to be amazing. The views were awesome. The wildlife was everywhere. Reason for my low rating was the disorganization on board. We were directed to change into wetsuits in a very small crowded area in choppy waters. Everyone was crashing into one another and the staff were not very helpful with their direction. The wetsuits were old and tattered smelly and wet. It seemed as though there were too many guests on board for everyone to be comfortable. Being in the water was chaotic. Very choppy waters and very little direction from staff of where and what to do.
It was advertised that there were beverages and snacks on board. Nothing was offered to me or my family. It was advertised that pictures were available for purchase. Nothing was provided to us to view or purchase.
I have been on tours all over the world (Egypt, Jordan, Thailand, Mexico, Dominican, Israel) and this was the most disorganized and disappointing tour I have ever been on.
Written November 7, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Incredible experience

Sep 2024 • Solo
This was an absolutely incredible experience. We got to see penguins, so many other birds, and of course sea lions! The water was freezing but completely worth it. I've visited 29 countries and this was in the top 5 experiences I've ever had! Sea lions are so curious and cute. Don't hesitate to book.

epi j
1 contribution

MASSIFICATION

Jul 2024 • Family
Good morning, I just got home after a week on the MSC EURIBIA Cruise, and unfortunately I was disappointed. It’s the fourth cruise I’ve done and the best thing about this is that the ship is new and clean. But I have to say that the overcrowding is excessive, the vessel is large but the number of passengers is excessive, the buffet is large but the overcrowding smears it, the dining room, for breakfast I have not had an opportunity to access and at lunchtime at 13:30 it is closed. What time do we eat Italians and Spaniards ???, at 12,00 to 13,00 ???, well no, let alone on holiday. The service of the waiters at the Sky Lounge and the dinner restaurant, excellent. But I repeat EXCESS PASSAGE.
Automatically translated
Written July 29, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

reviews.title: Palomino Islands - swimming with sea lion
reviews.text: Excellent experience. Highly recommend. Hundred of sea lions rush to you when jump into water. They are excited and curiously. Must stretch out your hands and feet, they will kiss your back of hand and toes. Water is really cold and rough, but wet suit is short sleeve, wonder why it is not a long sleeve? Tour guide is good. He help to took photo for us, even dive into water to take sea lion's somersault photo.

reviews.title: Amazing tour!
reviews.text: Amazing excursion! I could not believe how close the sea lions got to us. One of them kissed my feet. Rodrigo was an awesome guide and was super knowledgeable. Vista Adventures was awesome, answering messages very quickly. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: Loved swimming with the seals and probably the top 10 things I’ve done in my life! Unbelievable experience. We booked the tour 6pm the night before. We were picked up at 9am the following morning! We had the best day. Just remember to take your waterproof go pro or a waterproof phone cover. You won’t regret doing this tour. It’s an experience we will remember forever! Highly recommend.
